caseTitle: Hyderabad Cantonment Board thr. its Executive Officer v. Raj Kumar  & others
tagline: Parking fee is not envisioned under Section 200 of the Cantonment Act, 1924. Cantonment Board has no authority to enlarge the scope of charging section and include, conjecture or read some activity which is not envisioned or is not the contemplation of the charging Section 200 of the Act.
